Package game.behaviour

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Behaviour  
    HungerBehaviour
    Class that decides whether an actor is hungry and finds food if so
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BreedBehaviour
    Class that decides whether an actor is ready to breed and find a breed partner
    CarniHungerBehaviour
    Class that decides whether a carnivore is hungry and finds food if so
    FlyingBreedBehaviour
    Class that decides whether a flying type actor is ready to breed and find a breed partner within a certain radius
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor, or does something when it reaches the target
    GoToLocation
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a Location with target Growable/Item, or does something when the actor reaches the Location
    GoToTallGrowableBehaviour
    Behaviour for Flying Dinosaurs which have no objective and are on the ground, which will then find a Tall Growable to perch on.
    HerbHungerBehaviour
    Class that decides whether a herbivore is hungry and finds food if so
    LandBreedBehaviour
    Class that decides whether a ground type actor is ready to breed and find a breed partner within a certain radius
    MovingBehaviour
    Parent class for all moving related Behaviours
    PredatorBehaviour
    A class that decides whether the Actor can attack a nearby prey
    SmallBeakFeedingBehaviour
    Special Behaviour class that allows small dinosaurs to keep eating the same item for multiple turns
    ThirstBehaviour
    A behaviour class used to find water if thirsty.
    WanderBehaviour
